io.micronaut.context.env

Interface Environment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, ConversionService<Environment>, LifeCycle<Environment>, PropertyResolver, ResourceLoader, ValueResolver<String>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEnvironment

    public interface Environment
extends PropertyResolver, LifeCycle<Environment>, ConversionService<Environment>, ResourceLoader
    The current application environment.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

      • scan

        default Stream<Class> scan(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation)
        Scan the current environment for classes annotated with the given annotation. Use with care, repeated invocations should be avoided for performance reasons.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation to scan
        Returns:
        The classes

      • scan

        default Stream<Class> scan(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation,
                           String... packages)
        Scan the current environment for classes annotated with the given annotation. Use with care, repeated invocations should be avoided for performance reasons.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation to scan
        packages - The packages to scan
        Returns:
        The classes
